column4: how can i block the installation of a certain package with aptitude or apt-get ?
if that package is required by another package that you need to install, you don't do that
then don't install ubuntu-desktop and/or kubuntu-desktop. and ubotu is a bot.
i want kde with all resources as dcop and without big apps as koffice, kaffeine, etc that i will never use, kde-core did not have all that i want, is that posible?
